verses.translation: By the fig and the olive[1],
and by this secure city [of Makkah][3],

verses.arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.translation: Surely We have created man in the best form[4],
then We will reduce him to the lowest of the low[5],

verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: except those who believe and do righteous deeds; they will have a never-ending reward.
Then, what makes you deny the Judgment Day?
Is not Allah the Most Just of all judges?
